00141         return average;

00146         return xi[n-1];

00181 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_SimpleAliasTable {
00182 
00183 public:
00184 
00190     EGS_SimpleAliasTable(int N, const EGS_Float *f);
00191 
00193     ~EGS_SimpleAliasTable();
00194 
00199     int sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00200         int bin = (int)(rndm->getUniform()*n);
00201         return rndm->getUniform() < wi[bin] ? bin : bins[bin];
00202     };
00203 
00204 private:
00205 
00206     int       n;          
00207     EGS_Float *wi;        
00208     int       *bins;      
00209 
00210 };
